sub_fields.label: ratio
sub_fields.name: ratio
sub_fields.instructions:
ratio on 24
if you don't use it, blocks will have egal width

sub_fields.label: Catégories
sub_fields.name: categories
sub_fields.instructions:
Filtering is made possible by entering some words separated by a comma, and then writing this exact word in each block type
Ex :  e-Chèque Vacances,Site e-commerce,Site Vitrine
you don't need to specify 'ALL', it will be added automatically

sub_fields.label: block
sub_fields.name: block
sub_fields.instructions: Gives you a block with the ability to link to some internal content (a post for example)

sub_fields.label: image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: L'image est obligatoire dans ce block

sub_fields.label: link type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions:
popup, open in a popup
internal : same page
external : new window

sub_fields.label: link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: Create some content in the "Popup blocks" on the left navigation, and then link it here, it will open a popup with the content

sub_fields.name: category
sub_fields.instructions: the exact filtering word

sub_fields.label: ratio
sub_fields.name: ratio
sub_fields.instructions:
A ratio number relative to 24
if you have 2 blocks for example : 
16/24 and 8/24
If not filled, columns will have the same width

sub_fields.label: Add Common blocks
sub_fields.name: blocks_ID
sub_fields.instructions: If it is a single page, add common blocks here, menu items will be added automatically, you can disable menu items to show in the common block settings itself.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.message:
ONE PAGE TEMPLATE

_no primary menu _only common blocks menu will be created automatically along with the common blocks

FULL WEBSITE

_Primary menu (mandatory) _common blocks + flexible content in the page

Options

CODE : Embed Gist by adding a simple url : https://gist.github.com/2314628 https://gist.github.com/CODE_ID Slider : if you want a full slider, activate Revolution slider plugin, and add the shortcode in the flexible box Map : [googlemap localisation="lyra"]
